description: Emoji related commands that works with one emoji.

options.name: roles_reset
options.description: Reset the roles of an emoji.
The emoji you want to reset the roles from.

options.name: add
options.description: Add an emoji to your server by using an emoji.
The emoji you want to add to your server.

options.name: name
options.description: The name you want for the emoji.

options.name: create
options.description: Create an emoji on your server by using an image.

options.name: image
options.description: The image you want to use for the emoji.

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete an emoji from your server.
The emoji you want to delete from your server.

options.name: edit
options.description: Edit the name of emoji from a server
The emoji you want to edit.

options.name: lock
options.description: Lock an emoji to a role.
The emoji you want to lock.
The role to be added to the emoji

options.name: unlock
options.description: Unlock an emoji from a role.
The emoji you want to unlock.
The role to be removed from the emoji
